Hero.title: <important>Automate</important>  your leads with Dipilato Automations<important> AI agents</important> and close deals while you sleep.

Features.section_title: Automate With AI So YOU Can Surpass Your Current Potential
Features.section_description: Dipilato Automations helps you close more deals and save time with intelligent agents.
Features.feature1_description: AI voice agents that speak naturally, handle objections, and guide prospects to your calendar 24/7.
Features.feature2_description: Automated outbound callers that qualify leads, follow up, and even close simple deals on your behalf.
Features.feature3_description: AI bots that manage your tasks, schedule meetings, send reminders, and keep your day flowing smoothly.
Features.feature4_description: Stay updated on the go. Get AI-powered summaries, deal alerts, and instant replies right inside Telegram.
Features.feature5_description: Automate support, task tracking, and internal alerts inside Slack — all powered by smart AI bots.
Features.feature6_description: Track customer data, trigger automations, and send intelligent follow-ups via email and CRM workflows.

Pricing.section_title: Your Business Potential Through The ROOF!

PricingPlan.free_plan_description: Try our core features and experience AI automation risk-free.
PricingPlan.premium_plan_description: Perfect for solopreneurs or small teams ready to scale with automation.
PricingPlan.enterprise_plan_description: Built for established businesses wanting full AI-powered control and custom automation systems.

items.question: What makes Dipilato Automations different?
items.answer: Dipilato Automations combines powerful automation tools with personalized AI agents to streamline your business workflows...

items.question: Can I integrate my existing tools with Dipilato Automations?
items.answer: Absolutely. Dipilato Automations supports seamless integration with popular tools and CRMs...

items.question: What types of businesses benefit most from Dipilato Automations?
items.answer: Our platform is built to serve small business owners, real estate pros...

items.question: How does the AI outbound sales agent work?
items.answer: Our AI outbound sales agent is trained to handle real-time calls, qualify leads...

items.question: Do I need to be technical to use Dipilato Automations?
items.answer: Not at all. Our no-code interface and built-in templates allow you to launch bots, campaigns, and workflows...

items.question: What kind of support is available?
items.answer: We offer personalized onboarding, a resource-rich help center, and priority support channels...
